translation.en: [emcee] Thank you all for coming to the WCA World Championships, 2019!
translation.ja: 2019年 ＷＣＡ世界大会にようこそ

translation.en: [boy] Yes!
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: [interviewer] Who do you think will win the world championships today?
translation.ja: 誰が勝つと思う？

translation.en: Well, it's pretty tough competition.
translation.ja: 接戦になりそう

translation.en: My bet is on Feliks Zemdegs.
translation.ja: フェリックスだと思う

translation.en: Feliks Zemdegs.
translation.ja: フェリックス

translation.en: Pretty much one of the greatest cubers of all time.
translation.ja: 彼は史上最強だ

translation.en: I really want Feliks to win again.
translation.ja: 今年も勝ってほしい

translation.en: [announcer] From Australia, Feliks Zemdegs!
translation.ja: フェリックス･ゼムデグス

translation.en: I personally think Max Park will win,
translation.ja: マックスが勝つと思う

translation.en: because he's the most consistent cuber here.
translation.ja: 着実に結果を残してる 世界チャンピオンマックス･パーク

translation.en: I'd probably say Max Park.
translation.ja: マックスね

translation.en: -Max Park. -Max Park will be world champion.
translation.ja: マックス マックスが勝つ

translation.en: [emcee] From the United States of America, Max Park!
translation.ja: マックス･パーク

translation.en: I can't really decide between them.
translation.ja: どっちが勝つかな

translation.en: They're very, like, close, so it's definitely gonna be exciting.
translation.ja: 実力が拮抗(きっこう)してるから接戦になる

translation.en: [man] I think at the start, my parents thought it was just like a phase I was going through,
translation.ja: 僕がルービックキューブを始めた頃

translation.en: just like some random hobby that I picked up and might get rid of.
translation.ja: すぐに飽きるだろうと両親は思ってた

translation.en: But after the first time I solved it, like...
translation.ja: でも最初に完成させて以来

translation.en: I just wanted to get faster and faster. It was just so addictive.
translation.ja: 世界チャンピオンフェリックス･ゼムデグス タイムを縮めることに没頭した

translation.en: I just never got bored of it.
translation.ja: 夢中になったんだ

translation.en: [woman] It probably took me a little while to realize and understand how good he was.
translation.ja: あの子の才能にすぐには気付かなかった

translation.en: [young Feliks] 22.78.
He's got a serious addiction as well. Obsession.
translation.ja: 深刻な依存症というか取り憑つかれた感じだけど 深刻な依存症というか取り憑つかれた感じだけどフェリックスの母リタ･ゼムデグス

translation.en: But also an amazing talent.
translation.ja: フェリックスの母リタ･ゼムデグス驚くほどの才能もあった 驚くほどの才能もあった

translation.en: He used to walk around the house and dinner time
translation.ja: 夕食の時 私は言ったわ

translation.en: we would sometimes just say, "Put the cube away."
translation.ja: “キューブを置いて”って

translation.en: [young Feliks] Ah, 16.92.
[Rita] But he was just doing better and better all the time,
translation.ja: その後どんどん上達して

translation.en: and then all of a sudden setting world records,
translation.ja: 突然 世界記録を出したの

translation.en: and then media coming, and it was just a crazy, crazy ride.
translation.ja: マスコミが押し寄せて生活はガラっと変わった

translation.en: It is 22 past 7 now. Well, our next guest can solve a Rubik's Cube puzzle
translation.ja: 次のゲストはルービックキューブを

translation.en: in under 10 seconds, and he's only 13 years old.
translation.ja: 10秒以内に完成します なんとまだ13歳です

translation.en: [reporter] Fourteen-year-old Feliks Zemdegs broke two world records by a second.
translation.ja: 14歳のフェリックスは２つの世界記録を樹立

translation.en: -[reporter] What's your secret? -Practice.
translation.ja: 秘訣は？ 練習

translation.en: Please welcome Feliks Zemdegs. Come on, Feliks!
translation.ja: ゲストを迎えましょう

translation.en: [man] We as parents ended up becoming media managers, which was totally foreign to us.
translation.ja: 私たちは彼のマネージャーとなった

translation.en: We didn't know how to do all of this stuff,
translation.ja: マスコミの対応なんて

translation.en: how to manage the radio interviews and the television interviews.
translation.ja: 全くの素人なのにね 全くの素人なのにねフェリックスの父デビッド･ゼムデグス

translation.en: When he first broke the single world record, that sort of put him on the world stage, I guess.
translation.ja: 最初に世界記録を出した時彼は世界の舞台に立った

translation.en: That world record at the time was 7.08 seconds, and Feliks got 7.03 seconds.
translation.ja: 7.08の世界記録を7.03で破ったんだ

translation.en: [Feliks] Yeah!
translation.ja: やった！

translation.en: [spectator] Come on! Get sub-five!
translation.ja: さあ ５秒を切れ

translation.en: -[Feliks] Okay. -[spectator] Four-point-two!
translation.ja: よし すごいぞ　4.2だ世界記録達成！

translation.en: Whoa! That's a world record!
translation.ja: すごいぞ　4.2だ世界記録達成！

translation.en: He set so many world records that I have totally lost track.
translation.ja: 次々に世界記録を樹立したの

translation.en: [Feliks] I won the world championship in 2013.
translation.ja: 2013年の世界大会で優勝した

translation.en: And then 2015 going to finals I just had a lot of confidence,
translation.ja: 2015年も自信を持って決勝に臨み

translation.en: and so I managed to win that one, like, comfortably.
translation.ja: 余裕で優勝を果たした

translation.en: So, by the time it got to the world championships in 2017,
translation.ja: 2017年の世界大会が始まるまでは

translation.en: the question was, can anyone actually, like, beat me?
translation.ja: 僕を破る奴なんていないように思えた

translation.en: Yeah, I remember very specifically when I first became aware of Max.
translation.ja: マックスを知った時のことをよく覚えてる

translation.en: There was this video that was going around of this kid doing, like, a 4x4 one-handed
translation.ja: ある映像の中で 子供が片手で４×４を40秒以内に完成させた

translation.en: in 40 seconds or something like that.
translation.ja: 子供が片手で４×４を40秒以内に完成させた

translation.en: And I spent, like, two hours trying to beat this time.
translation.ja: 僕は２時間この記録に挑戦した

translation.en: I was like, "What is happening here? I can't beat this random kid on YouTube who does a 4x4 with one hand."
translation.ja: でも結局 その無名の子に勝てなかったんだ

translation.en: That very much caught my attention.
translation.ja: 衝撃を受けたよ

translation.en: I'd heard about, like, I guess, the way Max was from a couple of people who went to the US Nationals 2016.
translation.ja: アメリカ大会に行った人から彼の様子を聞いてたけど―

translation.en: But he was kind of a bit of a mystery to me.
translation.ja: 僕には謎めいた存在だった

translation.en: And then, like, middle of 2017, he got the 3x3 average world record.
translation.ja: 彼は2017年の半ば３×３平均で世界記録を出し

translation.en: Later on that year, in Paris, Max won the world championships.
translation.ja: パリの世界大会でも優勝した

translation.en: And that was his big moment of, "Okay, Max Park is here."
translation.ja: 僕のライバルが登場したんだ

translation.en: He's really, really good.
translation.ja: 彼はすごい

translation.en: Even though we were friendly, it was a little bit hard
translation.ja: 彼とは仲よくなったけど

translation.en: when it would be like every two or three weeks Max would just beat one of my records.
translation.ja: 次々に記録を破られた時はへこんだよ

translation.en: That was kind of annoying to deal with.
translation.ja: 本当につらかった

translation.en: -[boy] What? -Minute 30.
translation.ja: ２０１８年１月６×６平均 世界記録 何秒？ ２０１８年１月６×６平均 世界記録

translation.en: Got it.
translation.ja: ２０１８年６月５×５平均 世界記録 よし ２０１８年６月５×５平均 世界記録

translation.en: -Yeah! -[spectator] Oh, my god.
translation.ja: ２０１９年８月７×７単発 世界記録 やった ２０１９年８月７×７単発 世界記録

translation.en: I still am hanging on to the 3x3 average world record.
translation.ja: ３×３平均はまだ僕が記録保持者だ

translation.en: Yes!
translation.ja: ２０１９年４月３×３平均 世界記録

translation.en: [Feliks] I know he still, like, very, very much wants that back.
translation.ja: ２０１９年４月３×３平均 世界記録マックスが奪還を狙ってるけど マックスが奪還を狙ってるけど

translation.en: But that's probably, like, one of the things I'm the most proud of.
translation.ja: 死守できていて本当にうれしい

translation.en: [man] The first thing people probably wanna know about speedcubing
translation.ja: ポートランド州立大学統計学教授キット･クレメント ポートランド州立大学統計学教授キット･クレメント人々が知りたがるのはキューブの解法だ

translation.en: is how do you solve the cube?
translation.ja: 人々が知りたがるのはキューブの解法だ

translation.en: When you're learning how to solve a cube, you generally learn a set of algorithms:
translation.ja: まずはアルゴリズムを覚える必要がある

translation.en: move sequences that move certain pieces to other places,
translation.ja: 一連の手順で回転させながら

translation.en: building up layer by layer to eventually solve the cube.
translation.ja: １段ずつそろえていくんだ

translation.en: Most serious speedcubers learn around 300 algorithms
translation.ja: 熱心なキューバーは長時間 練習し

translation.en: through countless hours of practice.
translation.ja: 300ものアルゴリズムを覚える

translation.en: I think what really sets the top speedcubers apart from the rest
translation.ja: トップ･キューバーたちは

translation.en: is their ability to have very quick pattern recognition,
translation.ja: パターンを瞬時に認識する

translation.en: to memorize and synthesize hundreds of algorithms
translation.ja: そして脳内でアルゴリズムを合成し

translation.en: and to put all those into their muscle memory,
translation.ja: それを指の動きに変える

translation.en: to keep this all as seamless as possible. No starting and stopping.
translation.ja: この作業を流れるように行うんだ

translation.en: The undisputed main event is definitely the 3x3 event, and that's the one that everybody wants to win.
translation.ja: メインの種目は３×３でみんなが優勝を狙う

translation.en: [Kit] And these days, you can't talk about winning any event
translation.ja: 最近はどの種目でも優勝候補はマックスだ 最近はどの種目でも優勝候補はマックスだ 〝パーク〞

translation.en: without mentioning Max Park.
translation.ja: 最近はどの種目でも優勝候補はマックスだ 〝パーク〞

translation.en: I want to get three second! Come on!
translation.ja: ３秒が目標なのにダメだな ３秒が目標なのにダメだな 世界チャンピオンマックス･パーク

translation.en: Feliks doesn't react when he got four because he's the world record holder.
translation.ja: ４秒じゃフェリックスを倒せない

translation.en: [man] As a baby, as soon as we brought him home from the hospital,
translation.ja: 産院から連れて帰ってすぐ

translation.en: I felt something was a little off.
translation.ja: 何かがおかしいと感じた 何かがおかしいと感じたマックスの父ショーン･パーク

translation.en: We took him to the pediatrician. We had his hearing checked.
translation.ja: 聴力検査を受けさせたほど―

translation.en: He was just hyper-focused on whatever he was doing.
translation.ja: 何かに集中すると周りに反応しない

translation.en: And once we got his attention, he wasn't very interested in anything that we had to offer.
translation.ja: 他のことには興味を示さないんだ

translation.en: [woman] It was just kinda like, "He's gonna get better.
translation.ja: “きっと治る”と思ってた

translation.en: Okay, like, by the time he's gonna be three, he's going to be fine."
translation.ja: 〝３歳までには〞ってね 〝３歳までには〞ってねマックスの母ミキ･パーク

translation.en: It was my kinda big goal and hope and, you know, belief.
translation.ja: マックスの母ミキ･パークそれが望みでありそう信じたかったの

translation.en: [Max] Dang you, Feliks!
translation.ja: 〝フェリックス･ゼムデグス自己ベスト〞 フェリックスめ

translation.en: Look.
translation.ja: 〝フェリックス･ゼムデグス自己ベスト〞 見て

translation.en: [Schwan] We took him to the hospital, where we met with a child neurophysician,
translation.ja: 〝フェリックス･ゼムデグス自己ベスト〞 病院に連れて行き小児神経科医に診せると 病院に連れて行き小児神経科医に診せると

translation.en: and he, at that time, formally diagnosed Max with autism.
translation.ja: 正式に自閉症と診断された

translation.en: [Miki] First thing I was thinking is...
translation.ja: 最初はこう思った

translation.en: I don't know, it's just a...
translation.ja: 何と言うか…

translation.en: you kinda lost your... future, kind of thing.
translation.ja: 未来を奪われたとか…そんなことをね

translation.en: You had a beautiful... "I'm going to do this with my child and do this and that."
translation.ja: 子供といろんなことを一緒にしたかったのに

translation.en: And then, it's just kinda like, shut the door in front of you.
translation.ja: その夢が断たれた感じ

translation.en: [Schwan] I remember we were sitting at the edge of our bed,
translation.ja: 私たちはベッドの端に座り

translation.en: and we were just hugging each other, and we just both lost it.
translation.ja: 抱き合ったまま途方に暮れた

translation.en: We were just crying, and I think...
translation.ja: そして泣いた　たぶん…

translation.en: to me it felt like, "Let's cry our hearts out now and get to work."
translation.ja: 思い切り泣いてから前に進みたかったんだ

translation.en: [Miki] Hey Max, are you tired?
translation.ja: 疲れちゃった？

translation.en: From that point on is when we started to look for answers.
translation.ja: その時から私たちは答えを探し始めた

translation.en: [Miki] I kinda knew that there is a reason why this is in my life
translation.ja: こんなことが私の人生に起きたのには

translation.en: and this is my child.
translation.ja: 理由があるはず

translation.en: And I cannot just...
translation.ja: だから決して…

translation.en: give up.
translation.ja: 諦めない

translation.en: One day I just sat down and I was just kinda devastated.
translation.ja: ある日 私は完全に落ち込んでいた

translation.en: He doesn't look at me, he doesn't play with me.
translation.ja: あの子は私を見もせず―

translation.en: He is in his own world by himself.
translation.ja: 自分の世界に入ってる

translation.en: [Miki] So I just did it together. He lay down, I'd lay down.
translation.ja: 私は彼と同じことをした

translation.en: He did this, I'd do this, and then just kinda...
translation.ja: 彼がすることをまねたの

translation.en: not asking him anything. "I'm here.
translation.ja: 黙って寄り添いながら

translation.en: But, you know, when you're ready, I'm here with you."
translation.ja: 心を開くのを待つことにした

translation.en: And then one day we were playing with this phone. "Hello, hello."
translation.ja: そしてある日私たちは電話で遊んでた

translation.en: -[Max] Hello? -[Miki] Hello?
translation.ja: もしもし

translation.en: And he was holding my hand, and then he was looking at Daddy.
translation.ja: マックスは私の手を握りパパを見たの

translation.en: It was kinda like, "Daddy you're not invited."
translation.ja: パパをテントに入れずに

translation.en: Zip down.
translation.ja: 入口を閉めた

translation.en: That's a breakthrough thing. So he started to open up his world.
translation.ja: それが突破口となり彼は心を開き始めたの

translation.en: [Schwan] I think that was sorta like the first time that Miki started to enjoy her child as a child.
translation.ja: 妻はあの時 初めて楽しそうに息子と接していた

translation.en: [Schwan] It lit sort of like a fire within us to want more.
translation.ja: この出来事で私たちはいっそう奮起し―

translation.en: How can we get more of this?
translation.ja: 更なる改善を目指した

translation.en: As a child, Max could not do anything with his fingers. His fine motor skill was really stunted.
translation.ja: 彼は微細運動能力が未発達で指先の作業が苦手だった

translation.en: So we did tons of therapy working on his fingers.
translation.ja: 私たちは彼の指にいろんな療法を試した

translation.en: We had a Rubik's Cube in the house, and so he just wanted to solve.
translation.ja: ルービックキューブに興味を示したから

translation.en: I thought, "Why not?"
translation.ja: やらせてみたの

translation.en: [Schwan] He just gravitated towards it.
translation.ja: すぐに夢中になった

translation.en: Miki right away went on YouTube, and figured out how to solve it, and then taught Max.
translation.ja: 妻はYouTubeで解法を調べそれをマックスに教えた

translation.en: So she had two agendas in mind.
translation.ja: 彼女の狙いは２つ

translation.en: Here was something that I can use as a teaching component,
translation.ja: ルービックキューブを教材に使うこと

translation.en: but, at the same time, he loves it and... it would be a great thing for them to connect together,
translation.ja: そして この遊びで親子の絆を深めること

translation.en: not knowing at that time that he was just gonna rapid-fire down this rabbit hole.
translation.ja: でも彼の人生が変わるとは思わなかった

translation.en: -[Miki] What is it? -Thirty-one seconds.
translation.ja: 何秒？ 31秒

translation.en: [Miki] Okay!
translation.ja: すごいわね

translation.en: [Schwan] The very first competition he went to, it was just an exercise
translation.ja: 私たちはマックスを大会に連れて行った

translation.en: in me and Miki bringing him to a social event where he was gonna learn to stand in line,
translation.ja: 社会的行事に参加すれば並ぶことを覚えられる

translation.en: look at somebody else for a cue to start cubing.
translation.ja: 競技のやり方も習得できるし

translation.en: Wait your turn, wait till somebody says it's okay.
translation.ja: 順番を待つことも学べるはずだ

translation.en: It was a giant play date situation
translation.ja: 他の子供と接することで

translation.en: that we were going to exploit for Max's social development.
translation.ja: 社会性を持たせようとしたんだ

translation.en: So we went there and I was surprised, because this pointing--
translation.ja: そこで 驚くことが起きたの それまで…

translation.en: We tried everything to teach him pointing.
translation.ja: 私たちは指さすことを必死で教えてた

translation.en: Pointing is something that is a hallmark for autistic kids to not have.
translation.ja: 指をさすのは自閉症の子供がしない動作だ

translation.en: When he went to the competition,
translation.ja: でも その時

translation.en: we remember he was pointing at people and saying, "Here's this person." You know, all these people.
translation.ja: マックスは人々を指さしてた

translation.en: [Max] 9.15. He got sub-10.
translation.ja: あの人 10秒切った

translation.en: [Schwan] We were like, huh? He's pointing, and this is coming out naturally.
translation.ja: 驚くことに自然に指をさしてたんだ

translation.en: That was when we realized, "Wow, this is... this is great."
translation.ja: その時 私たちは“これはいける”と思った

translation.en: Max's first award came at the very second competition he ever went to.
translation.ja: マックスは２度目の大会で初めて優勝した

translation.en: [announcer] In first place, we have Max Park.
translation.ja: 優勝したのはマックス･パーク

translation.en: [Schwan] That's when it dawned on us. "Wow, I think he has something."
translation.ja: その時 彼の才能に気付いてこう思った

translation.en: I remember thinking, "If he's really good at this and this is something that he loves to do,
translation.ja: “この競技は彼が得意で熱中できるものだ”

translation.en: we are going to run with this."
translation.ja: “これに賭けよう”

translation.en: [Schwan] 2017 Worlds was the first time
translation.ja: 2017年の大会で 初めてフェリックスと対戦した 〝２０１７年 パリ世界大会〞

translation.en: that Max competed against his idol, Feliks Zemdegs.
translation.ja: 2017年の大会で 初めてフェリックスと対戦した

translation.en: He ended up winning 3x3 at Worlds that year, which was a really big deal.
translation.ja: ３×３で優勝したのには感動したが

translation.en: But the big win for us was when he was up on the podium.
translation.ja: 表彰台での出来事はもっとうれしかった

translation.en: He looked at the way he was holding his prize and his shingle
translation.ja: マックスは賞品と表彰状を持って

translation.en: and he looked at the podium next to him
translation.ja: 隣の子を見た

translation.en: and he immediately readjusted himself to be like the person next to them.
translation.ja: そして 持ち方をその子に合わせたんだ

translation.en: Me and Miki, we looked at each other and were like, "Did you see that?"
translation.ja: 私たち夫婦は顔を見合わせた

translation.en: Because for us, an autistic kid looking at his peer and mimicking is like the ultimate goal.
translation.ja: 仲間に合わせる行動こそ最終目標だったからだ

translation.en: [whispering] I heart you.
translation.ja: 〈愛してる〉

translation.en: You too.
translation.ja: 私もよ

translation.en: [Schwan] Obviously, when you look at Max, he's a 17-year-old kid. He's six foot tall.
translation.ja: マックスは一見すると背の高い17歳の青年だが

translation.en: But emotionally, he's about, I would say, seven, eight, maybe nine.
translation.ja: 精神年齢はせいぜい９歳ってところだ

translation.en: And so going into these competitions, we were just concerned about his ability to deal with failure.
translation.ja: だから 負けた時に対処できるのか心配だった

translation.en: Okay, ready? Let's go.
translation.ja: じゃあ出発だ

translation.en: Ready.
translation.ja: いいです

translation.en: Max, a few weeks back, had somebody else in North America get a really good time,
translation.ja: 数週間前 北米の選手がすばらしい記録を出した

translation.en: and he... he had really high expectations of beating that.
translation.ja: マックスはその記録を破る気満々だったんだ

translation.en: Bam! Let's go!
translation.ja: よし やるぞ

translation.en: [man] Max! Kill 'em!
translation.ja: マックス いけ

translation.en: [man] All right, that concludes the first half of the day. We're ending a little bit early.
translation.ja: 少し早いですが前半はこれで終了です

translation.en: [Schwan] And then it just didn't happen, and when that happened he just--
translation.ja: 結局 マックスはその記録を破ることができず

translation.en: He was very, very disappointed.
translation.ja: ひどく悔しがった

translation.en: Because the luck happened!
translation.ja: あんなのまぐれだ

translation.en: [Schwan] In the meantime, we're holding back our own heartache,
translation.ja: 私たちの胸は痛んだ

translation.en: because regardless of if it was warranted or not, it still kills us.
translation.ja: 覚悟はしてたもののやっぱりつらい

translation.en: We have the window of hope still open for his emotional skills developing.
translation.ja: 彼に感情を抑える能力が備わることを期待してる

translation.en: -[beep] -[man] Okay. Okay.
translation.ja: ２０１８年西海岸ツアーＰＲ テイク１

translation.en: Now, in order to win the giveaway, you'll need to be at one of the West Coast competitions.
translation.ja: 西海岸ツアーに出て賞品を勝ち取ろう

translation.en: So make sure you include in your comment
translation.ja: 出る種目を明記してね

translation.en: which competition you'll be attending, right, Max?
translation.ja: 出る種目を明記してね だろ？

translation.en: Right, Feliks?
translation.ja: だろ？

translation.en: -[woman] "Right, Feliks." -Right.
translation.ja: いい？

translation.en: [man] No, go, "Right, Feliks!"
translation.ja: “だね”だよ

translation.en: -Right, Feliks. -Yeah, that's right.
translation.ja: “だね” そうだ

translation.en: [man] Okay. Ready? One more time.
translation.ja: もう１回 いくよ

translation.en: All right, one more time, Max. One more time.
translation.ja: もう１回だよ ほら

translation.en: [Schwan] The first time that we ever saw Feliks
translation.ja: フェリックスとは フェリックスとは２０１３年 世界大会

translation.en: was when we went to the 2013 World Championships in Las Vegas.
translation.ja: ２０１３年 世界大会ラスベガスの世界大会で初めて会った ラスベガスの世界大会で初めて会った

translation.en: Feliks was the first person that Max ever asked for an autograph,
translation.ja: マックスがサインや写真をねだったのは

translation.en: and he was the very first person he ever took a picture with.
translation.ja: フェリックスが初めてだった

translation.en: He just had this mythical, legendary status.
translation.ja: 彼は伝説的な存在だったんだ

translation.en: So four years later now, Max is bigger than Feliks.
translation.ja: ４年経った今マックスは彼より大きい

translation.en: And, you know, it was really... yeah, it was awkward.
translation.ja: 何だかすごく… 不思議な感じ

translation.en: After he broke the 3x3 world record average, I, like, messaged his Facebook account.
translation.ja: 彼が世界記録を出した時ＳＮＳで連絡した

translation.en: I was just like, "Congratulations, you guys. Really well done. You should be really proud."
translation.ja: ”おめでとう”ってメッセージを送ったんだ

translation.en: And then... yeah, met him for the first time at the Championships, and he was very, very excited.
translation.ja: 世界大会で会った時彼はすごく興奮してた

translation.en: [Schwan] Max and Feliks, they're cut from the same cloth.
translation.ja: あの２人は 似た者同士だ

translation.en: They push each other... but I think they also understand each other.
translation.ja: 互いをけん制しながらも理解し合ってるようだ

translation.en: [Max] 4x4 top three, right?
-[Feliks] Top three, that's us. -[Max] In the world, right?
translation.ja: そうだ “世界の”だろ？

translation.en: -[Max] Get 17, okay? -[Feliks] You're first, right?
translation.ja: 17秒を出せ 君が１位だ

translation.en: [Max] Okay, ready. Go!
translation.ja: よし 始め

translation.en: Come on.
translation.ja: マズい

translation.en: [spectators] Feliks got it.
translation.ja: フェリックスの勝ち

translation.en: [man] One more.
translation.ja: もう１回

translation.en: -One more time? -Yeah.
translation.ja: もう１回？

translation.en: [Feliks] What do you wanna sing, Max?
translation.ja: 何 歌う？

translation.en: "Bohemian Rhapsody"? That's so hard.
translation.ja: “ボヘミアン・ラプソディ”？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Let's do it!
translation.ja: そう

translation.en: [Rita] Clearly, they're rivals,
translation.ja: ２人はライバルであり

translation.en: but they're friends,
translation.ja: 友達でもある

translation.en: and it's just beautiful to watch Max looking up to Feliks in a way.
translation.ja: マックスがフェリックスを慕う様子は微笑ましいわ

translation.en: Anything Feliks does, Max will do.
translation.ja: フェリックスのまねばかりしてる

translation.en: You gotta brush your teeth every night before you go to sleep and after dinner, because Feliks does it.
translation.ja: フェリックスをまねて 毎晩歯をみがくようになった

translation.en: -Right, Max? -Right.
translation.ja: だろ？ だね

translation.en: [Schwan] Every time Max does really well or breaks a record,
translation.ja: マックスが記録を出すたび

translation.en: we get a text from Feliks and he says, "Tell Max I'm so happy for him and congratulations."
translation.ja: フェリックスはお祝いのメールをくれるんだ

translation.en: And I'm sure that it doesn't feel good, especially if it's his record or something that Max breaks.
translation.ja: 自分の記録が破られた時はつらいはずなのにね

translation.en: Nice one. Good job.
translation.ja: いいね　よくやった

translation.en: What a great human being he is
translation.ja: 彼は立派な人間だから

translation.en: that he just makes sure that he's a good friend first.
translation.ja: 友達であることをまず示してくれるんだ

translation.en: [Feliks] I think if I won Worlds this year, that would be pretty epic.
translation.ja: 今年の世界大会で勝てたら最高だ

translation.en: And to win it in, like, Melbourne where, you know, I've grown up,
translation.ja: メルボルンは僕が育った街だから

translation.en: that would just... that would complete everything.
translation.ja: そこで勝てたら言うことなし

translation.en: I moved to Sydney in February this year.
translation.ja: 今年の２月にシドニーに移って

translation.en: I, like, did an internship with this trading firm.
translation.ja: 貿易会社でインターンをした

translation.en: But I have no idea of what I want to do for a career or, like, the rest of my life.
translation.ja: でも 今後の人生何をしたいのか分からない

translation.en: Cubing is, like, the thing that I'm really, really passionate about,
translation.ja: 夢中になれるキュービングを

translation.en: so I want to keep that a big part of my life.
translation.ja: 生活の中心に置いておきたい

translation.en: [Schwan] I know in cubing, people start to slide down the rankings
translation.ja: キューバーは成人になる頃から

translation.en: about the time that they would normally enter adulthood.
translation.ja: ランキングを落とし始める

translation.en: Because life happens.
translation.ja: 人生は大変だ

translation.en: You have to pay rent, you have to find a partner,
translation.ja: 家賃を払ったり結婚を考えたり

translation.en: you have to buy ketchup.
translation.ja: 調味料を買ったり

translation.en: I mean, there's all these things that you have to make happen.
translation.ja: そんなことに時間を使うから―

translation.en: You just can't cube as much.
translation.ja: 練習ができない

translation.en: -[upbeat music playing] -[people chattering]
translation.ja: ゴールデン･ラウンジ

translation.en: Which event have you prepared the most for?
translation.ja: メインはどの種目？

translation.en: 3x3 is always the most exciting.
translation.ja: ３×３が一番面白い

translation.en: It's the Rubik's Cube. It's the original cube.
translation.ja: 元祖ルービックキューブだ

translation.en: You can lose everything else, do really terribly,
translation.ja: 他の種目で失敗しても

translation.en: but if you win 3x3, it's great, it's all that matters.
translation.ja: ３×３で勝てれば“全て良し”

translation.en: [man] Is Max, like, the best cuber in the world?
translation.ja: マックスは世界最強？

translation.en: Max is the king.
translation.ja: 王者だね

translation.en: 2016, it's like, "Oh, there's this kid and he's quite fast."
translation.ja: 2016年は“有望な子だな”

translation.en: 2017, it's like, "Oh, you won the world championships."
translation.ja: 2017年は“世界大会で勝ったか”

translation.en: And then 2018, it's like, "Oh, now he holds every world record."
translation.ja: 2018年は“全種目で世界記録かよ”

translation.en: -[woman] Yeah. -Yeah.
translation.ja: 確かに

translation.en: He's just the best at everything.
translation.ja: 全てでトップだ

translation.en: Okay, Max. Go in.
translation.ja: マックス 乗って

translation.en: [Schwan] All right Max, let's go. Let's meet Feliks.
translation.ja: フェリックスと会うぞ

translation.en: [Miki] Be careful, okay? It's slippery.
translation.ja: 滑らないように 滑らないように 世界大会まで２日 世界大会まで２日

translation.en: Oh, look who it is! Hey, Max.
translation.ja: よく来たね マックス

translation.en: [Max] I missed you.
translation.ja: 久しぶり

translation.en: I missed you too a lot. How's it going?
translation.ja: 会いたかった　元気？

translation.en: Hi! Nice to see you!
translation.ja: ハイ　久しぶり

translation.en: -Hey, Jason, what's going on? -Hi, what's up?
translation.ja: どうも やあ 元気かい？

translation.en: -Feliks, how are you? -Good evening.
translation.ja: やあ 元気かい？ こんばんは

translation.en: Welcome to dinner.
translation.ja: ようこそ

translation.en: [Max] Congrats, Feliks.
translation.ja: おめでとう

translation.en: Congratulations, Feliks, on your world record average, 5.69.
translation.ja: 平均5.69の世界記録を出したね

translation.en: Thank you, Max. It's good, right? When are you gonna beat it?
translation.ja: ありがとうすぐ君が破るんだろ？

translation.en: Vegetables, Max.
translation.ja: 野菜は？

translation.en: [Max] Oh, sure.
translation.ja: 食べる

translation.en: [Feliks] Yes, and green.
translation.ja: そうだ　緑のも

translation.en: -Green. Yeah. -Yep.
translation.ja: 緑の？ そう

translation.en: [Schwan] One, two, three. One more. One, two, three. Good.
translation.ja: １、２、３ もう１枚 いくぞ

translation.en: All right.
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: [David] Well, these days, I think a lot of people would say
translation.ja: このところ 世間の予想では

translation.en: that Max is what we would call the favorite.
translation.ja: マックスが本命だ

translation.en: But when Feliks won the US Nationals last year against Max,
translation.ja: 〝２０１８年キュービングＵＳＡ〞 でも昨年 フェリックスがマックスを破ると でも昨年 フェリックスがマックスを破ると

translation.en: I thought, "Hang on. It could be whatever happens on the day."
translation.ja: 何が起きるのか予測できなくなった

translation.en: In looking at the competition between the two of them coming up to the current world championships,
translation.ja: 次の世界大会でどちらが勝つか分からない

translation.en: who knows?
translation.ja: 誰にもね

translation.en: -[Schwan] Max, time to get up. -[Max grunts]
translation.ja: マックス 起きて 世界大会当日の朝

translation.en: [woman] Three, two...
My teeth is hurting right now.
translation.ja: 今 歯が痛いんだ

translation.en: [announcer] Thank you all for coming to the WCA World Championships 2019.
translation.ja: 2019年 ＷＣＡ世界大会にようこそ 2019年 ＷＣＡ世界大会にようこそ ２０１９年ＷＣＡ世界大会

translation.en: So, next up, we have the biggest of the biggest.
translation.ja: 次に登場するのは大物中の大物 次に登場するのは大物中の大物世界大会 ライブ配信

translation.en: -[man 1] We've got Max Park. -[man 2] Look who's next to him.
translation.ja: マックス そして隣も大物

translation.en: [man 2] First solve by Feliks.
translation.ja: まずフェリックス

translation.en: -[man 1] Not ideal for him. -[man 2] No, definitely not.
translation.ja: 不満の様子 確かに

translation.en: -[man 1] Holy guacamole. -[man 2] Holy guacamole.
translation.ja: 驚いた すごい記録

translation.en: That is a ridiculously good start.
translation.ja: 最高のスタートです

translation.en: [man 3] Feliks is at... 1.30 right now. He's not even in podium.
translation.ja: フェリックスは1分30秒表彰台に届きません

translation.en: One-seventeen!
translation.ja: 1分17秒

translation.en: [man 1] Feliks is like, "Okay, Max."
translation.ja: “やられた”って表情

translation.en: Wow!
translation.ja: なんと！

translation.en: [Miki] Oh, my gosh, it's a world record!
translation.ja: すごい　世界記録だ

translation.en: [man 1] Jeepers creepers!
translation.ja: ビックリ仰天

translation.en: I can't believe it.
translation.ja: 本当？

translation.en: [man 1] Is Feliks nervous, or are his hands cold?
translation.ja: フェリックスは緊張してるのか

translation.en: [man 2] He's really pissed.
translation.ja: 動揺してる様子

translation.en: Hell yeah.
translation.ja: 本当だ

translation.en: Max is like, "Just get out. This is my competition."
translation.ja: マックスは敵なし

translation.en: -Feliks going for his third now. -Oh no.
translation.ja: フェリックスの３回目 マズい

translation.en: You don't want to see that.
translation.ja: 見てられない

translation.en: -[man 2] Nineteen-oh-eight! -[man 1] Another 18!
translation.ja: 19.08 見事な記録

translation.en: Max Park showing who's boss.
translation.ja: マックスが圧倒します

translation.en: [man 2] That is five world championships for Max Park so far.
translation.ja: 現時点で５種目制覇です

translation.en: Okay. Okay, everybody, one, two, three. Look up here, Bill!
translation.ja: 撮るわよ　１、２、３… ビル こっち見て

translation.en: One, two, three, smile. Come on, Bill.
translation.ja: １、２、３　笑って ビルったら

translation.en: [competitor] One more.
translation.ja: もう１枚

translation.en: -[Miki] Oh, one more? -[man] One more.
translation.ja: ３×３の出場者 上位16名が控え室に集合

translation.en: All right, we're gonna go, folks.
translation.ja: では始めましょう

translation.en: All right, Juliette, you can come up.
translation.ja: ジュリエットから

translation.en: [announcer] The first female 3x3 finalist in the world championship since 2003,
translation.ja: 2003年以来 世界大会で初の女性決勝進出者

translation.en: please welcome France's Juliette Sébastien.
translation.ja: ジュリエット･セバスティアン

translation.en: -[applause, cheering] -[fanfare playing]
translation.ja: ジュリエット･セバスティアン ３×３決勝 ３×３決勝

translation.en: [man 1] Juliette Sébastien looking at yellow right now, switching--
translation.ja: 黄色の面を見ながら… 黄色の面を見ながら… ジュリエット･セバスティアンフランス

translation.en: -The cube dropped! -She knows she could have got faster.
translation.ja: ジュリエット･セバスティアンフランス ジュリエット･セバスティアンフランス おっと落とした おっと落とした 失敗です

translation.en: [man 1] Oh, my god. There are no pauses, straight into pink.
translation.ja: 止まることなくピンクを完成 セバスチャン･ヴァイヤードイツ

translation.en: Yellow, J Perm, 6.29!
translation.ja: セバスチャン･ヴァイヤードイツ そしてＪパーム 6.29 そしてＪパーム 6.29

translation.en: [man 2] He'll be really happy with that. Nod of the head.
translation.ja: 満足げに うなずきます

translation.en: [man 1] And that's a pause. Oh, six!
translation.ja: ショーン･パトリック･ビリャヌエバフィリピン 完成 ６秒だ

translation.en: [man 2] He did it. He's taken the lead!
translation.ja: ショーン･パトリック･ビリャヌエバフィリピン ショーン･パトリック･ビリャヌエバフィリピン トップに立ちました トップに立ちました

translation.en: I'm speechless.
translation.ja: 言葉も出ない

translation.en: -[man 2] Aw, the hug from Kian to Sean. -[man 1] That's great sportsmanship.
translation.ja: キアンが祝福します いいね

translation.en: [man 2] Sean's probably on his way to, if not a podium,
translation.ja: 表彰台は分かりませんが

translation.en: at least a top-five finish.
translation.ja: ５位は確定です

translation.en: [man 1] Remember, he's trying to beat a 6.78 average by Sean.
translation.ja: フィリップ･ヴァイヤードイツ ショーンの平均6.78に挑みます ショーンの平均6.78に挑みます

translation.en: -It's looking good. -[man 2] Now, that's a good solid 5.97.
translation.ja: これは速そうだ　まずは5.97

translation.en: [announcer] Five-point-nine-seven.
translation.ja: タイムは5.97です

translation.en: [man 1] Best case scenario is 6.49 average, which would put him ahead of Sean.
translation.ja: 最速のケースで平均6.49ショーンを抜けます

translation.en: [man 2] Let's see what he can do. This is gonna be really, really important,
translation.ja: どうでしょうこの試技が勝敗を分けます

translation.en: so don't blink, stay tuned, hold your breath.
translation.ja: どうでしょうこの試技が勝敗を分けます 瞬きせずに見守りましょう

translation.en: [man 1] It's looking good.
translation.ja: 順調です

translation.en: [man 2] He's still looking good. No chokes, no chokes.
translation.ja: まだミスはないようです

translation.en: [man 1] What a-- What a solve!
translation.ja: 見事なソルブです

translation.en: Oh, my god, he just slotted himself into first right now!
translation.ja: ここでトップに立ちました

translation.en: [man 2] Six-seventy-four, that is first place right now.
translation.ja: 6.74　現時点で１位

translation.en: -That guarantees Philipp for the podium. -[man 1] Guaranteed podium for Philipp.
translation.ja: ３位以内です 表彰台は確定

translation.en: [man 2] Very impressive.
translation.ja: すばらしい

translation.en: [man 2] Next up is gonna be the local hero, our favorite, Feliks Zemdegs.
translation.ja: 次は地元のヒーローフェリックス･ゼムデグス

translation.en: [announcer] Our sixth place seed has won Worlds twice in 2013 and 2015.
translation.ja: 第６シードは世界大会を２回制した男

translation.en: Please welcome Australia's Feliks Zemdegs.
translation.ja: フェリックス･ゼムデグス

translation.en: [man 1] This is what we want. Yeah!
translation.ja: 歓声が上がった

translation.en: Yeah, Australians standing up.
translation.ja: 地元ファンが立って―

translation.en: Applauding him.
translation.ja: 拍手を送ります

translation.en: [man 1] I imagine Feliks is gonna have a fair bit of pressure.
translation.ja: 今回 表彰台に届いたのは１種目だけ

translation.en: He's only gotten one podium this weekend and this would be the first Worlds
translation.ja: 今回 表彰台に届いたのは１種目だけ １位を取れない初の世界大会にはしたくない

translation.en: where he isn't a world champion if he doesn't take it home here.
translation.ja: １位を取れない初の世界大会にはしたくない

translation.en: So you could say there's a lot on the line for that reason.
translation.ja: まさに真剣勝負です

translation.en: [man 2] But then again,
translation.ja: でも彼なら…

translation.en: if anybody can do well under pressure, it's Feliks.
translation.ja: プレッシャーに勝てるはず

translation.en: [man 1] Yeah, he is still the greatest of all time, regardless.
translation.ja: ええ　史上最強ですからね

translation.en: No lockups thus far. At least no big ones.
translation.ja: スムーズに手が動きます

translation.en: -Looks like... Okay. -Good. Six and four. A perm.
translation.ja: これは… よし Ａパーム

translation.en: -Plus two. -Oh no.
translation.ja: プラス２ 何てこと

translation.en: [announcer] Feliks with a 9.60.
translation.ja: タイムは9.60です

translation.en: [man 2] Two second time penalty, 'cause that cube is not solved completely.
translation.ja: 完成してないので２秒のペナルティ

translation.en: [man 1] Over 45 degrees off with a 90 degree off, one turn off.
translation.ja: ズレが45度を超えてしまいました

translation.en: That's gonna put the pressure on.
translation.ja: 重圧がかかります

translation.en: [man 2] Now we'll see what Feliks is made of.
translation.ja: 今こそ実力が試されます

translation.en: [man 1] Yeah, nerves of steel or...
translation.ja: 強い精神力がなければ…

translation.en: Or is it game over?
translation.ja: 終わりです

translation.en: -[man 2] Rats. -Okay, that's not a good start.
translation.ja: 最初は失敗でした

translation.en: And that's gonna be diag.
translation.ja: 斜めになる

translation.en: [man 2] E perm.
translation.ja: Ｅパーム

translation.en: Six-sixty-one, though. I mean, for those cases, for that solve--
translation.ja: タイムは6.61 難しいソルブでしたが6.6は立派です

translation.en: It was not an easy solve and he still got a 6.6.
translation.ja: 難しいソルブでしたが6.6は立派です

translation.en: -[man 1] But he's not gonna win. -That's not enough.
translation.ja: でも… 届かない

translation.en: [man 1] Guaranteed no world champion titles for Feliks Zemdegs. First time this has happened since 2011.
translation.ja: 本大会は 彼が優勝できない初の大会となるのでしょうか

translation.en: We are officially in a new era of cubing.
translation.ja: 新時代の到来です

translation.en: [man 2] I think it's almost safe to say he will not be on the podium this year.
translation.ja: 恐らく彼は表彰台を逃すでしょう

translation.en: [referee] Twelve seconds.
[man 2] There he goes, with blue. He chose to start on blue.
translation.ja: まず青から取り掛かりました

translation.en: -[man 1] Okay, this is-- -This is gonna be good.
translation.ja: よさそうです

translation.en: [man 1] Slight lockups, but...
translation.ja: ひっかかったが…

translation.en: [announcer] Feliks with a 6.45.
translation.ja: タイムは6.45です

translation.en: ...secures his current third place,
translation.ja: 今の時点で３位

translation.en: but he's got to get through really good competitors if he wants to keep the podium.
translation.ja: 表彰台の前に強敵たちが立ちはだかります

translation.en: -Could've been worse. -It's not too bad.
translation.ja: 悪くない まあまあ

translation.en: [Miki] I'm so proud of you.
translation.ja: あなたは最高

translation.en: No matter what happens, it doesn't matter, okay?
translation.ja: 何が起きても大丈夫だからね

translation.en: -All right. -[stage tech] Okay, guys.
translation.ja: いい？ 時間よ

translation.en: Okay, go, Max. Go, go!
translation.ja: マックス 頑張れ

translation.en: -You can do it. -Okay, Max.
translation.ja: 頑張れよ

translation.en: You can do it.
translation.ja: いけ

translation.en: [Max] I don't need to get podium.
translation.ja: 順位は気にしない

translation.en: I'm just gonna get sub-six average, okay?
translation.ja: サブ６を狙う

translation.en: [Miki] Yeah, and I know you're gonna get lots and lots of...
translation.ja: そうね　あなたは…

translation.en: [Max] I can get a sub... I can get a sub-six average, okay?
translation.ja: 絶対に平均６秒を切るからね

translation.en: I don't need to get podium...
translation.ja: 表彰台は考えない

translation.en: [Miki] Max, when you compete with who?
translation.ja: ライバルは誰？

translation.en: Feliks Zemdegs.
translation.ja: フェリックス

translation.en: You're gonna get lots of?
translation.ja: 狙うのは？

translation.en: [Max] World records.
translation.ja: 世界記録

translation.en: [Miki] Yeah! You did it already, right?
translation.ja: たくさん取ったわよね

translation.en: So don't worry! Just have--
translation.ja: だから心配ない

translation.en: -[Max] I got this! -Go for it, yeah.
translation.ja: 勝つ 頑張って

translation.en: [Max] I can do it, sub-six average, okay?
translation.ja: ６秒を切るよ

translation.en: [Miki] Yes.
translation.ja: ええ

translation.en: [man 1] And now, the GOAT.
translation.ja: 王者の登場

translation.en: [announcer] Our number one seed... -[Max] Sub-six average. -...the defending world champion.
translation.ja: 第１シードは前回のチャンピオン

translation.en: Please welcome from the United States, Max Park.
translation.ja: マックス･パークです

translation.en: [man 1] Park, defending world champion. Max Park from the United States.
translation.ja: アメリカ代表前回優勝者のマックスです

translation.en: Will he be the first person to win six events at a world championship?
translation.ja: １つの世界大会で６冠を狙います

translation.en: -[man 1] So he's already-- -Previous record of five.
translation.ja: すでに５冠達成

translation.en: [man 1] So, he's already won the 4x4, the 5x5,
the 6x6, the 7x7, and one-handed events.
translation.ja: 現時点で ４×４ ５×５６×６ ７×７ そして片手で優勝

translation.en: Insane!
translation.ja: 怪物です

translation.en: Now, don't blink, it's Max Park time.
translation.ja: 瞬きせずにご覧ください

translation.en: And he's off. He chose the yellow cross. One pair, two pair, three pair, four pair.
translation.ja: 黄色のクロスを選択 １ペア ２ペア…

translation.en: -OLL. -[man 2] Ah, V perm.
translation.ja: ＯＬＬ Ｖパーム

translation.en: [man 1] Oh, that is not very good.
translation.ja: 少し遅れました

translation.en: [announcer] Max with a 7.70.
translation.ja: マックスの記録 7.70

translation.en: Where's Phil? Where's Phil?
translation.ja: フィルはどこだ？

translation.en: [ref] Eight-point-five.
[man 1] Max is in a bit of danger here. It's really up in the air.
translation.ja: マックスが苦戦するとは予想外です

translation.en: Philipp could be world champion.
translation.ja: フィリップが優勝か

translation.en: -Clean. Looking good. -[man 2] That is good. That is good.
translation.ja: 速い 今度はいい

translation.en: [announcer] Max with a 6.42.
translation.ja: マックスの記録 6.42

translation.en: [man 1] Yup, Max is bringing it back big time.
translation.ja: 挽回しました

translation.en: His counting is a 6.57 going into the last two.
translation.ja: 現時点で6.57残る試技は２回

translation.en: A lot on the line, especially for Max Park.
translation.ja: 崖っぷちです

translation.en: [man 2] Nothing's decided yet. It will all depend on the last solve.
translation.ja: 最後まで優勝の行方は分かりません

translation.en: This is going to decide if Max Park is the world champion
translation.ja: 優勝するのはマックスでしょうか

translation.en: or if Philipp Weyer gets the upset.
translation.ja: それともフィリップでしょうか

translation.en: [Feliks] What does he need? Robin, what does he need?
translation.ja: 何秒なら勝てる？

translation.en: -[Robin] Like a 6.7, I think. -[Feliks] What does he need?
translation.ja: 6.7くらい 何秒？

translation.en: [Robin] 6.7?
translation.ja: 6.7かな

translation.en: [man 1] Dude, this is so huge. This is literally everything right now.
translation.ja: これですべてが決まります

translation.en: Will he get back to back GOAT status? Or will it be Philipp?
translation.ja: フィリップのタイムを破れるのか

translation.en: [competitor 1] Guys, make space for Philipp to run.
translation.ja: フィリップを通して

translation.en: No, don't. Max is a boss.
translation.ja: マックスが勝つさ

translation.en: Like, come on. I know he's gonna get this. I'd be expecting a six.
translation.ja: 見てろ　彼ならやれる ６秒を出す

translation.en: [man 1] Seven flat? Seven flat!
translation.ja: ７秒ジャスト

translation.en: -[man 2] Philipp did it! -[man 1] Philipp did it!
translation.ja: フィリップが勝った

translation.en: Philipp is the new world champion.
translation.ja: フィリップが優勝

translation.en: Wow.
translation.ja: なんと

translation.en: [man 1] I don't think anyone would've predicted this podium, by the way.
translation.ja: ３×３決勝結果 これは予想外の結果でした これは予想外の結果でした これは予想外の結果でした １ フィリップ ６・７４２ ショーン ６・７８

translation.en: [Miki] Okay, Max, let's go out.
translation.ja: マックス 行こう

translation.en: [Max] I didn't inspect well, right?
translation.ja: インスペクションが敗因

translation.en: [Miki] Yeah, it's okay, Max. You know, everybody makes mistakes.
translation.ja: いいのよ　誰でもミスをする

translation.en: [Max] Yeah.
translation.ja: うん

translation.en: [Miki] This is a good learning, okay?
translation.ja: いい勉強になったわ

translation.en: -[Max] Okay. -You can do it next time.
translation.ja: そうだね 次はうまくいく

translation.en: Here you go.
translation.ja: どうぞ

translation.en: [Feliks] I tried, I tried.
translation.ja: 頑張ったよ

translation.en: So close.
translation.ja: 惜しかった

translation.en: -[Feliks] You did good. You did fine. -[Miki] Yeah.
translation.ja: 上出来だ 楽しかった

translation.en: -[Miki] Okay. -You destroyed everyone.
translation.ja: 最強だな

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.ja: 大丈夫

translation.en: -Yeah, it's okay. -It makes us stronger.
translation.ja: もっと強くなれる

translation.en: [Miki] Yeah, it makes us stronger, okay?
translation.ja: いい勉強よね

translation.en: -Exactly. You still beat me. -Yeah.
translation.ja: 僕を負かしたしね

translation.en: [Max] "No podium" makes us stronger, right?
translation.ja: 失敗で強くなれる

translation.en: Exactly.
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: [Feliks] The thing that me and Max always say is, "If you mess something up, it makes you stronger."
translation.ja: 僕たちはいつも言う“失敗で強くなれる”

translation.en: So I think that was what he was saying. "No podium" makes him stronger.
translation.ja: 表彰台を逃して更に強くなるんだ

translation.en: And then I still told him, he still beat me by 0.01 seconds.
translation.ja: 彼は0.01秒僕より速かったけど

translation.en: But yeah, I could tell he was like pretty bummed that he didn't win the 3x3.
translation.ja: ３×３で勝てなくてがっかりしてた

translation.en: [Max] It's okay, right?
translation.ja: いいよね？

translation.en: -[Max] It's okay. -Right. It's fine.
translation.ja: もちろんよ

translation.en: Dude, you're five time... five world championships. [laughs]
translation.ja: ５種目を制したんだぞ

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.ja: 大丈夫

translation.en: -You won everything. -[man] Yeah, you did great.
translation.ja: 無敵だった すごいよ

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: It's a hard thing: Max just dominating the entire competition,
translation.ja: マックスは圧倒的に強かったのに

translation.en: but then missing out on the big one.
translation.ja: 人気種目で勝てなかった

translation.en: And yeah, I've been in that situation, so I know how... I know how he must feel at the moment as well.
translation.ja: 僕にも同じ経験があるから彼の気持ちは分かる

translation.en: Dang, Feliks didn't get podium. -Dang it, right? -Yeah.
translation.ja: フェリックスは表彰台を逃したね

translation.en: But he did okay average, right?
translation.ja: でも平均はよかった

translation.en: Right, yeah.
translation.ja: そうね

translation.en: [voice growing emotional] Max looked at Feliks in the backstage,
translation.ja: マックスは舞台裏を見た

translation.en: and I could-- I know Max. He was looking at Feliks.
translation.ja: そこにいるフェリックスを見てたの

translation.en: Feliks didn't make a lot of things,
translation.ja: 力が出せなかった彼を

translation.en: and he was really feeling sorry for him.
translation.ja: 気の毒に思ってたのね

translation.en: I knew that Max didn't know how to say the words, but...
translation.ja: でもマックスは慰め方が分からない

translation.en: lot of things he wanted to say. So I felt like, ah...
translation.ja: 言いたいことがいっぱいあるのに

translation.en: friendship. But Max cannot express.
translation.ja: 友情の念を表現できないのよ

translation.en: So I wanted to talk about that to Feliks in person.
translation.ja: だから 私がフェリックスと話して

translation.en: Let him know that Max really loves him.
translation.ja: 彼の気持ちを伝えたかった

translation.en: [Feliks] Max! You gotta go!
translation.ja: マックス 行け

translation.en: Out of his way.
translation.ja: 通して

translation.en: Out of the way, Kieran. Go, go, go!
translation.ja: 通してくれ　行け

translation.en: [Feliks] Nerves at world championships are very much real.
translation.ja: 世界大会は神経が擦り減る

translation.en: It's pretty draining,
translation.ja: かなりきつい

translation.en: for, you know, four days to try and be solving
translation.ja: ４日間 ソルブを繰り返さなきゃならない

translation.en: while catching up with everyone, not sleeping much.
translation.ja: 仲間との交流もあり寝る時間もない

translation.en: For me, like, you know, not doing especially well this competition also adds to that exhaustion.
translation.ja: 今回 僕は力が出せなくて余計に疲労を感じた

translation.en: It was a big letdown for me.
translation.ja: 散々だった

translation.en: [interviewer] Any last thoughts about this Worlds in general?
translation.ja: この大会の感想は？

translation.en: Um...
translation.ja: そうだな…

translation.en: [voice growing emotional] I started out so long ago,
translation.ja: 僕はずっと前このメルボルンで

translation.en: solving cubes with a couple of people here in Melbourne,
translation.ja: 仲間たちとキューブを始めた

translation.en: meeting up and having these fun little competitions.
translation.ja: 数名で小さな大会を開いたんだ

translation.en: And to know that like...
translation.ja: そして今ここで

translation.en: you know, they would hold the world championships here...
translation.ja: 世界大会が開かれた

translation.en: and so many friends from all around the world and family and my friends from Melbourne here
translation.ja: 世界中の仲間や僕の家族や友達が来て

translation.en: could come along and enjoy this...
translation.ja: この大会を楽しんだ

translation.en: it's very, very special. Very special. It's pretty sad that it's over.
translation.ja: 本当に特別な大会だから終わったのが寂しい

translation.en: [Schwan] The biggest fear that I've always had was how Max was going to deal with loss.
translation.ja: マックスが失敗に対処できるか心配だった

translation.en: And so when he lost,
translation.ja: だから負けた時 こう思った

translation.en: it almost felt like, "Okay, the time has come.
translation.ja: だから負けた時 こう思った “私たちの出番だ”ってね

translation.en: Now time to get to work."
translation.ja: “私たちの出番だ”ってね

translation.en: The big win for us is that Max, he did okay emotionally.
translation.ja: だけど 今回彼は取り乱さなかった

translation.en: [Miki] He managed his nervousness and made new friends.
translation.ja: 緊張を制御して新しい友達も作ったわ

translation.en: He told me that it's okay.
translation.ja: 彼は言ったの　“大丈夫”

translation.en: "It's okay. Mama, I didn't cry."
translation.ja: “泣かなかったよ”って

translation.en: So... that's winning for us.
translation.ja: 私たちにとっては大きな勝利だったわ

translation.en: Podium. You get a podium.
translation.ja: 表彰台に立ったね

translation.en: [Schwan] I don't think Feliks knows how big of an impact he has on Max's life.
translation.ja: フェリックスの影響力は絶大だ

translation.en: [Schwan] Without a doubt, Feliks is going to be Max's hero forever.
translation.ja: 彼はマックスにとって永遠のヒーローなんだ

translation.en: [Max] Boom, baby!
translation.ja: フェリックスの世界記録を破った
